title: Baba Yaga

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Kidnap a player at night. You may only do this if you do not have a player currently kidnapped
- Eat all currently kidnapped players, dealing a basic attack to them

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A kidnapped player is roleblocked through immunity each night they’re still kidnapped
- If you die while someone is kidnapped, that person stops being kidnapped
- When you receive the necronomicon, your attack and defense goes up by a tier, and you’re allowed to kidnap one extra player at any given time

desc:
Post 5250
_”Веди себя хорошо и ешь овощи, а то Баба Яга тебя достанет.”_
